title: Vaccine Rollout Plan, Can Trump Be Safely Ignored? 11.19.20
itunes:title: Vaccine Rollout Plan, Can Trump Be Safely Ignored? 11.19.20
description:
In episode 763, Jack and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by writer and producer Joelle Monique to discuss the coronavirus vaccine roll out plan, Trump firing anyone who won't go with his voter fraud claims, officials being worried about the Iran/US relations, Ben Shapiro complaining about Harry Styles, ambient television, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Coronavirus vaccine roll-out plan hindered by Trump stonewalling Biden transition
  2. Pfizer says it will work with four states to refine plans for rolling out its vaccine.
  3. How to Stop a Power Grab
  4. Trump Fires Election Security Director Who Corrected Voter Fraud Disinformation
  5. #MurphyBreakdown YES THEY DID! Orwellian! even in Milwaukee and Dane!
  6. How Months of Miscalculation Led the U.S. and Iran to the Brink of War
  7. Noted ‘WAP’ Critic Ben Shapiro Is Big Mad Over Harry Styles’ Love Of Women’s Clothes
  8. “Emily in Paris” and the Rise of Ambient TV
  9. WATCH: The Masked Singer 4 - Gremlin Sings Ben E King's Stand By Me And Then Freaks Out!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
